20110110150555.000|20110110150557.000|CC1|YOU SEE ON THE NEWS AFTER HE HAS
20110110150557.000|20110110150600.000|CC1|COME IN CLASS WITH AN AUTOMATIC 
20110110150600.000|20110110150600.000|CC1|WEAPON.

20110110153049.000|20110110153051.000|CC1|HAS HAD A TROUBLED PAST.        
20110110153051.000|20110110153052.000|CC1|AND CBS NEWS JUSTICE

20110110153054.000|20110110153055.000|CC1|THIS MORNING.                   
20110110153055.000|20110110153055.000|CC1|BOB?                            
20110110153055.000|20110110153056.000|CC1|>> Reporter: GOOD MORNING,      
20110110153056.000|20110110153056.000|CC1|CHRIS.                          
20110110153056.000|20110110153059.000|CC1|WELL, JARED LEE LOUGHNER IS NOT 
20110110153059.000|20110110153100.000|CC1|COOPERATING AT ALL WITH HIS     
20110110153100.000|20110110153101.000|CC1|INTERROGATORS.                  
20110110153101.000|20110110153103.000|CC1|SO FAR HE'S OFFERED NO          
20110110153103.000|20110110153104.000|CC1|EXPLANATION FOR SATURDAY'S      
20110110153104.000|20110110153105.000|CC1|DEADLY SPREE.

20110110153106.000|20110110153107.000|CC1|THAT LOUGHNER IS A TROUBLED AND 
20110110153107.000|20110110153109.000|CC1|ANGRY LONER WHO SECRETLY MAPPED 
20110110153109.000|20110110153114.000|CC1|AN ASSASSINATION PLAN.          
20110110153114.000|20110110153116.000|CC1|SOURCES SAY JARED LEE LOUGHNER  
20110110153116.000|20110110153118.000|CC1|WENT TO CONGRESSWOMAN GABRIELLE 
20110110153118.000|20110110153120.000|CC1|GIFFORDS' POLITICAL GATHERING   
20110110153120.000|20110110153122.000|CC1|INTENT ON KILLING A TARGET HE'D 
20110110153122.000|20110110153123.000|CC1|TRACKED FOR SEVERAL YEARS.      
20110110153123.000|20110110153125.000|CC1|A SEARCH OF A SAFE IN LOUGHNER'S
20110110153125.000|20110110153127.000|CC1|HOME REVEALED AN ENVELOPE WITH  
20110110153127.000|20110110153129.000|CC1|HAND-WRITTEN NOTES READING, "I  
20110110153129.000|20110110153131.000|CC1|PLANNED AHEAD," "MY             
20110110153131.000|20110110153132.000|CC1|ASSASSINATION," THE NAME        
20110110153132.000|20110110153134.000|CC1|GIFFORDS AND WHAT APPEARS TO BE 
20110110153134.000|20110110153135.000|CC1|LOUGHNER'S SIGNATURE.           
20110110153135.000|20110110153136.000|CC1|INVESTIGATORS SAY LOUGHNER MAY
